title: Double vanities* and vanity mirrors with decorative lighting
posting_body: Visit This Website to See More:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 736 Sq.
Welcome to Aura Watson Branch, a brand-new luxury apartment community in Mansfield, Texas.

Discover how upscale features and modern amenities blend with a quiet hometown atmosphere to create an unparalleled living experience just minutes from the ample opportunities that await you in Dallas-Fort Worth.
- Sophisticated shaker-style two-tone kitchen cabinets with under cabinet lighting
- Granite countertops and under-mount sinks with Stylish backsplash
- Spacious walk-in closet(s) with custom wood shelving
- Stainless steel kitchen appliances: side-by-side refrigerator with water and ice dispenser, built-in microwave, and dishwasher*
- Double vanities* and vanity mirrors with decorative lighting
*Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time
- Resort-style pool with cabanas, a spacious deck, and propane grills
- Business lounge with private conference rooms
- Clubhouse with kitchen and shuffleboard table
- Controlled access with video intercom system
- A multi-level fitness center with cardio theatre, strength equipment, and free weights
- Outdoor courtyard(s) with a fire pit and bocce ball court
Comments: Breed restrictions apply, pet records and photo required.
Please contact leasing office for details.
